title: View pdfs
text: With version 1.2, you can now view pdfs in the app. With noted pdf viewer you can also write and draw on the pdfs.

title: Support for excalidraw
text: With version 1.2, you can now view excalidraw files in the app. You can also edit the excalidraw files.

title: Split screen
text: With version 1.2, you can open any of the supported files in split screen mode. Just right click on the file and select split.

title: Noted home file
text: With version 1.2, you can now access the home file from the actionbar. This can be easily accessed from a click of a button.

title: Noted actions
text: With version 1.2, you can now perform actions while writing by typing \ in the editor. This includes translating and rewriting the text.

title: Backgrounds
text: With version 1.2, you can now change the background of the app. You can select from a variety of backgrounds or import your own background.

title: Block styles
text: With version 1.2, you can now select from a variety of new and updated block styles.

title: More customizations
text: With version 1.2, you can now customize the app even more. This includes
list: Change the look of the scrollbar
Show or hide file name as Noted title
